word: How pleased Satan would be if in the very time when men should be selling their possessions to sustain the cause of God, he can so deceive them that all their available means shall be invested in land speculation and other worldly enterprises, thus taking away from the cause of God means which should flow into the treasury to advance His work in the earth.--Letter 41, 1888, pp. 1, 3, 4. (To "My Dear Brethren and Sisters at Fresno," July 7, 1888.)
